generatedTitle: The Mystery of the Singer on "Don't Leave Me This Way" by the Communards

extractFactDictList.question: Who wrote the song 'Don't Leave Me This Way'?
extractFactDictList.sentence: "Don't Leave Me This Way" was written by Jim Steinman, a renowned American songwriter and producer who has worked with many famous artists throughout his career.
